revision.text: == Test Case 1 - emphasis_lines_min, emphasis_gov_symbol, callout_number == === Expected score - 3 === * emphasis - No "government" line (yellow) * emphasis - not enough emphasis lines (yellow) * callout_number - no callouts (yellow)

== Test Case 2 - emphasis_gov_symbol when it's not last == ===Expected score - 1 === * emphasis - No "government" line (yellow)
ראו באתר הביטוח הלאומי
מגיעים לכם X שקלים
אולי?
This exists just to ignore callout_number

===Expected score - 5 === * Emphasis line is too long (yellow) * Emphasis line is too long (red) * Too many emphasis lines (red)
There are more than 5 emphasis lines overall
There are more than 5 emphasis lines overall
There are more than 5 emphasis lines overall
There are more than 5 emphasis lines overall
This emphasis line is more than 15 words but less than 30, so it should trigger a yellow warning
This emphasis line is more than 30 words, so it's way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, way, too long and should trigger a red error
This exists just to ignore callout_number
{{סוג ערך|זכות}}

== Test Case 4 - PageQualityScorerReadability: blocked_expressions, para_length, para_length_max, sentence_length, sentence_length_max == ===Expected score - 10 === * 1 blocked expression (red) * 2 sentences too long (yellow) * 1 sentence too long (red) * 2 paragraphs too long (yellow) * 1 paragraph too long (red) supercalifragilisticexpialidocious sentence_length, para_length: This line should be more than 15 words but less than 30 (yellow warning). sentence_length_max: This line is more than 30 words, and it will also bring the paragraph's length to more than 40 words but less than 60 - we still need a few more words to make it to 30. para_length_max: The following lines will be short. However, the overall paragraph length will be more than 60 words. Way, way, more than 60 words. Way, way, more than 60 words. Way, way, more than 60 words. Way, way, more than 60 words. Way, way, more than 60 words. Way, way, more than 60 words. Way, way, more than 60 words. Way, way, more than 60 words. Way, way, more than 60 words. Way, way, more than 60 words. * sentence_length: This tests the behavior of list items as sentences and paragraphs; this line is more than 15 words. * para_length: This tests the behavior of a list item as a paragraph. Each sentence is not too long. The overall should be a bit more than 40 words and show a warning. So let's pad it with a few more words.
This exists just to ignore callout_number

== Test Case 5 - PageQualityScorerTableRules: table_columns, table_rows == ===Expected score - 2 === * More than 3 columns in table (yellow) * Less than 3 rows in table (yellow) {| ! table_columns: !! this table has more than 3 columns || Which isn't great !! and causes a warning |- | It also has || Less || than || 3 rows |- |}

== Test Case 6 - PageQualityScorerCalloutsRules: callout_gaps, callout_section_begin == ===Expected score - 2 === * callout_gaps (yellow) * callout_section_begin (yellow)
Callout 1
Callout 2
== Section begins ==
Callout 3
There's a callout before the section text!

== Test Case 7 - PageQualityScorerReadability: list_items_per_level_max == ===Expected score - 4 === * 2 × list_items_per_level_max (red) * 1 * 2 * 3 ** 3.1 ** 3.2 ** 3.3 ** 3.4 ** 3.5 * 4 *# 4.1 *# 4.2 *# 4.3 *# 4.4 * 5
